author: slava77
body:
This extractor was never used in CMSSW, since its introduction in CMSSW_1_4_0_pre3.
The original purpose was to provide a method that can remap input IsoDeposit map from one track or collection to another (e.g. after pt sorting or skimming).

Recent need for maintenance for ExtractorFromDeposits came up with #22762. 
This revealed a bug in the implementation of the overloaded base method. The bug was introduced in Mar 2008 around CMSSW_2_0_0_pre5 when the base class ::deposit method signature was changed.

Instead of fixing this code, it seems more practical to just remove it.
title: remove ExtractorFromDeposits in  RecoMuon/MuonIsolation
